name: Space Swarm 64 Version 2 (C64)
description:
Mega UPDATED Version: Keep Reading..

A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Fun Arcade Like Shoot 'em' up, Shoot the Aliens, Pick up Bonus ball, Get to the End and do it all over again.

Made with the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and with added Seuck Enhancment Framework by Richard Bayliss of TND, Had to mess around and alter and remove some code as it did not play nice on Linux using KickAss Assembler also had to compile stuff from source like pucrunch, but now the Game has a better Title Screen, High Score Table, Title Screen Music also by Richard Bayliss and other hidden code to make Seuck games better, Redone a few sprites as i did not like some in the first version, and touch up some sprites too, added some more Bonus Balls and a few more enemy's.

Does have 1 Bug i can not figure out, on first load of the game the Title Screen Graphics for the word "Swarm" is all 1 colour white when it should have some Gray but once you play the game once and get a game over or press RESTORE key ingame to return to Title screen it's back to 2 Colours?.

Also should work on NTSC C64 as it has some small code for showing the score but i have not TESTED this, so yeah have FUN.
